    • Constructor Detail

      • PointComp

        public PointComp(double[] start,
                 double[] upper,
                 double[] lower,
                 java.lang.Boolean reverse,
                 Point point,
                 LayoutController layoutController)
        Parameters:
        start - the coordinates of the point where the upper and lower line meet/start
        upper - the coordinates of the end of the upper line
        lower - the coordinates of the end of the lower line
        reverse - whether or not the point is in reverse, if set to false the point is drawing with the single track on the left and the 2 on the right (<), if false the point is inverted
        point - the point object to draw
        layoutController - passed for the super constructor
